summary: At the end of 1952, with the best years of Hank Williams's career behind him, he hires a local kid to drive him through the Appalachian countryside for a pair of New Years shows in West Virginia and Ohio.
cast: Jesse James|Stephen Tobolowsky|Ray McKinnon|Henry Thomas|Natalie Canerday|Danny Thomason|Lawrence Hamilton|Graham Gordy|Bill Butler|Fred Thompson|Mark W. Johnson|James Hampton|Jeff Bailey|Dash Goff|Clint Albright|Matt Lindahl|Kaley Cuoco|Rick Dial|Jennifer Pierce Mathus|Will Koberg|Gary Newton|Ricky King|John Darnall|Doug Dole|Nathan Young|Ron Scott|Vinnie Girard|Alan Brewer|Brock Clyburn|Jimmy Dinwiddie|Drew Fedak|Glynn Nooner|Len Schlientz|Jason Sligh|Kristen Packard
title: The Last Ride
